00037 /*
00038  * Server_Helper.h
00039  *
00040  *
00041  *
00042  *  Created on: 07-Jan-2011
00043  *      
00044  */
00045 
00046 #ifndef SERVER_HELPER_H_
00047 #define SERVER_HELPER_H_
00048 
00049 #include <string>
00050 
00051 using namespace std;
00052 
00053 
00054 
00055 //! Server Helper interface
00056 /**
00057  * Users of the Distributed Map need to provide
00058  * semantics for the put operation using this
00059  * helper class.
00060  *
00061  * The put operation calls helper.combine()
00062  * to perform the accumulate operation
00063  *
00064  * All server helpers must implement this interface
00065  */
00066 class Server_Helper {
00067 public:
00068     virtual void combine(const string entity, const string& old,
00069             const string& delta, string& combined) = 0;
00070 };
00071 
00072 #endif /* SERVER_HELPER_H_ */
